mapper.insert: insert into freeReply (rno, bno, reply, replyId, replyPw) values (freeReply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyId}, #{replyPw})
mapper.select: select count(*) from freereply where bno = #{bno}
select count(*) as result from freereply where rno = #{rno} and replyPw = #{replyPw}
mapper.update: update freereply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = ${rno}
